messages.subject: How do they do this? (from michelle to the UDC list)
messages.msgSnippet: Dear the UDC list, This is SO COOL.  I just found a web page that will actually draw a sketch of you online in about a minute.  The results are pretty
messages.messageBody:
Dear the UDC list,

This is SO COOL. I just found a web page that will actually draw a sketch of you online in about a minute. The results are pretty accurate. Give it a try and then tell me what you think!



Click on the link below...

http://passthison.com/sketch/?t=the+UDC+list&f=michelle

or <a href="http://passthison.com/sketch/?t=the+UDC+list&f=michelle">click here!</a>

I look forward to your reply!

michelle

____________________________________________________________________
